block.p: A graphic last Sunday about developments in the war on terror reversed the pictures above two brief news reports. The photograph of a soldier standing with a rifle should have appeared with the report about a meeting of allied countries in Canada to discuss strategy for Afghanistan. The photograph of a soldier's face should have appeared with the report about an assertion by Pakistani generals that they had reclaimed some control of tribal areas bordering Afghanistan.
